events.title: Golden Hour Gathering
events.description: An evening of heart-led connection and storytelling. Meet women who get it, share what's on your heart, and leave with at least two new friendships that actually feel aligned.

events.title: Sunset & Strategy
events.description: Bring your big dreams and your questions. This session blends mindset coaching with real talk about building a life and business that doesn't burn you out. Expect clarity, connection, and golden hour magic.

events.title: Electric Evening
events.description: High energy, playful connection, and a little bit of magic. This is networking that doesn't feel like networkingâ€”think deep conversations, spontaneous laughter, and the kind of introductions that actually stick.

events.title: New Moon Reset
events.description: A gentle evening to release what's heavy and set intentions from a grounded place. Includes guided meditation, journaling prompts, and a sound bath to help you exhale into the new cycle.

events.title: Nervous System Sanctuary
events.description: Your nervous system has been working overtime. This restorative session combines gentle yoga, breathwork, and guided relaxation to help you come back home to yourself. Soft lighting, warm tea, deep rest.

events.title: Full Moon Flow
events.description: Move slowly, breathe deeply, and let the full moon energy wash over you. This evening weaves together slow yoga flow, candlelit meditation, and a closing sound healing session. Leave lighter and more connected to yourself.
